Description.Text: The hotel's name is derived from its address, 30 East 30th Street. Thirty Thirty in New York City, a premier Midtown Manhattan hotel, perfectly located near most major business and leisure attractions. The hotel offers the comfort and convenience of a European-style hotel at an affordable price. This is a trendy, budget hotel, located in midtown Manhattan between 5th and Madison. Empire State Building, Macy's, Gramercy Park, Murray Hill and Union Square, School of Visual Arts, Fashion Institute of Technology and the Toy District are all nearby the hotel. Thirty Thirty Hotel provides a residential ambience. A high-ceilinged lobby decorated in pale tones includes globe lights and colored panels framed in brushed aluminum.

• Madison Square Park - 4 blocks • Madison Square Garden/Penn Station - 4 blocks • Empire State Building - 4 blocks • Macy's department store - 6 blocks • Garment District - 6 blocks • Flatiron Building (National Historic Landmark) - 7 blocks • Grand Central Terminal - 0.5 mile • Union Square Park - 0.5 mile • Times Square - 0.75 mile • Rockefeller Center - 0.75 mile • Radio City Music Hall - 0.75 mile • Washington Square Park (Greenwich Village) - 1 mile • Soho district - 1.25 miles • Chelsea Piers - 1.25 miles • Jacob K. Javits Convention Center - 1.25 miles • Museum of Modern Art - 1.25 miles • Little Italy - 1.5 miles • Carnegie Hall - 1.5 miles • Central Park - 1.5 miles • Columbus Circle (Time Warner Center, CNN tour, shopping/dining) - 1.75 miles • Tribeca district - 1.75 miles • Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts - 2 miles • Chinatown - 2.25 miles • American Museum of Natural History - 2.5 miles • Metropolitan Museum of Art - 2.75 miles • Financial District - 3 miles

Thirty Thirty Hotel offers 253 guestrooms in a 12-story building. Beds are dressed with 310-thread-count cotton linens, down comforters, and down/feather pillows. All rooms provide high-speed Internet access (surcharge). Other amenities include clock radios, coffeemakers, daily newspaper delivery, and safes large enough to accommodate laptop computers

Built in 1920 and renovated in 2001, this fully air-conditioned hotel comprises a total of 243 rooms spread over 12 floors. Parking is for free. Guests are welcomed in the inviting lobby, which features a 24-hour reception desk, safes for securely storing valuables, a cloakroom, and a lift. Two computers in the lobby provide high-speed Internet access (surcharge). Guests of Thirty Thirty Hotel may use a fitness center three blocks away without charge. A laundry room contains coin-operated machines. A nearby deli offers 24-hour room service without delivery charges.

• Golf - driving range • Ice skating • Swimming • Rowing or canoeing • Aerobics • Racquetball/squash • Running track/path • Tennis • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding/rental • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing
• All Major credit cards are accepted. • Check-in time is 3 PM. • Check-out time is Noon.

• • Driving directions from LaGuardia: Take Grand Central Pkwy west to I-278 (Brooklyn-Queens Expy) west. Take I-495 (Long Island Expy) west, then take the Queens Midtown tunnel and exit to 35th St/34th St. Turn right on E 34th St, then turn left on 5th Ave. Turn right on E 30th St. • • Driving directions from JFK: Take I-678 (Van Wyck Expy) north to I-495 (Long Island Expy) west. Take the Queens Midtown tunnel and exit to 35th St/34th St. Turn right on E 34th St, then turn left on 5th Ave. Turn right on E 30th St. • • Driving directions from Newark: Follow signs to take US 1/US 9 north to I-95 (New Jersey Tpke) north (toll road). Take I-495 to the Lincoln Tunnel and exit to West Side Hwy/40th St. Turn right on W 40th St, turn right on Broadway, then turn left on E 30th St.

Zana's :- Independent restaurant/bar with white tablecloths, fresh flowers. Open for breakfast, lunch, dinner. Mediterranean cuisine with choices such as brick-oven pizza, pasta, seafood, chicken. Bar service to late night. Sidewalk seating in warm weather.
